data.lyric:
[ti:Best Part(feat. H.E.R.)]
[ar:Daniel Caesar/H.E.R.]
[al:Freudian (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Best Part(feat. H.E.R.) - Daniel Caesar/H.E.R.
[00:07.03]Oh hey
[00:15.04]You don't know babe
[00:18.10]When you hold me
[00:21.09]And kiss me slowly
[00:23.33]It's the sweetest thing
[00:27.62]And it don't change
[00:30.52]If I had it my way
[00:34.09]You would know that you are
[00:39.86]You're the coffee that I need in the morning
[00:42.92]You're my sunshine in the rain when it's pouring
[00:46.07]Won't you give yourself to me
[00:48.19]Give it all oh
[00:51.72]I just wanna see
[00:53.26]I just wanna see how beautiful you are
[00:59.66]You know that I see it
[01:02.86]I know you're a star
[01:06.10]Where you go I'll follow
[01:09.25]No matter how far
[01:12.37]If life is a movie
[01:15.76]Know you're the best part ooh
[01:22.69]You're the best part ooh
[01:29.76]Best part
[01:31.79]It's this sunrise
[01:35.01]And those brown eyes yes
[01:38.21]You're the one that I desire
[01:44.53]When we wake up
[01:47.66]And then we make love make love
[01:51.33]It makes me feel so nice
[01:56.62]You're my water when I'm stuck in the desert
[01:59.87]You're the Tylenol I take when my head hurts
[02:04.10]You're the sunshine on my life
[02:10.32]I just wanna see how beautiful you are
[02:16.49]You know that I see it
[02:19.64]I know you're a star
[02:22.79]Where you go I'll follow
[02:26.23]No matter how far
[02:29.31]If life is a movie
[02:32.52]Then you're the best part oh
[02:39.72]You're the best part ooh
[02:46.56]Best part
[02:47.71]If you love me won't you say something
[02:50.81]If you love me won't you
[02:53.37]Won't you
[02:54.18]If you love me won't you say something
[02:57.12]If you love me won't you
[02:59.43]Love me won't you
[03:00.70]If you love me won't you say something
[03:03.61]If you love me won't you
[03:06.83]If you love me won't you say something
[03:09.99]If you love me won't you
[03:12.16]Love me won't you
